lines.text:
[He shines his flashlight on Robert, who has his foot up on the seat]
All right, get your foot off the seat.
I'm just resting, Pops.
You want to rest? Go to bed. Get your foot off the seat.
I was never so embarrassed in all my life! I mean, even the principal couldn't believe that you would make up such a ridiculous story!
It's not ridiculous. I didn't make it up.
Oh. Well, then, god forgive us. He is crazy.
Oh, no. Harriet!
What else would you call it? I mean, ask him. Ask him why he thinks he's getting stronger because his hair is getting longer. Is that what God said? Did God talk to you?
No. It was a feeling. It just came to me.
It just came to you. Well, it just came to me that you will get your hair cut, tomorrow and that you'll ever bring up this-this Samson nonsense, again. Is that clear? Is that understood?

[Annoyed]
Yes!
[He gets up and walks outside]
And since you think you're so strong with that big head of hair of yours, you can take out the trash, tonight!
[Sam then gives Harriet a dirty look]
And don't look at me, like that. I just want him to look normal.

[after their vehicles collide at the drive-in]
Aw, shit. Look at that fender!
Well, look what you did to my car!
Are you trying to say it was my fault?
[He shoves him]
Will you lay off?

[smiles]
Well, lookie here. Little Gene is bad. Come on, what are you going to about it, huh?
[Grabs him]
Lay off!

[Shoves him again]
What are you going to do about it?

[Fearful]
Gene, get in the car, please.
That's right, Gene. You better get in that car before you get another set of bandages.
Robert.

[Annoyed]
What?
Leave him alone.
I am not doing anything. He's the one that's looking so mean. In fact, I think he wants to fight. I told you. I'll give you two punches. Come on, give me your best shot.
[Gene doesn't move]
Well, come on, jewboy, give be your best shot, huh?
[He still doesn't move]
Well, come on!
[after a pause he knocks Robert out with a hard punch that sends him flying into a series of trays of food. Everybody, including Gene, cannot believe what happened, so he gets into the car]
I'm sorry you had to see that.

[Smiles]
It's perfectly all right with me.
